effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 454,328 over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 225,992.
Set: Verdant Embrace always grants Insurance! to you and your target for 6 sec and its cooldown is reduced by 4.0 sec.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description: Use: Carve a wax copy of your target, which absorbs 50% of their damage taken. The absorption heats up the wax, causing it to melt after absorbing 3.5 million damage. (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)

Equip: Upon entering combat, and every 60 sec, gain either Massive or Miniature for 30 sec.

Miniature
Reduces your size by 20%, and increases your Speed by 1,272 and Haste by 8,522.

Massive
Increases your size by 20%, maximum health by 339,647, and Intellect by 8,508.
Use: Zap yourself for 272,438 Nature damage, gaining 16,473 Intellect for 15 sec. (45 Sec Cooldown)
Equip: You champion the causes of your guild.  All guild reputation gains are increased by 50%.
